query.esql:
FROM logs-corelight.suricata*
| WHERE event.dataset == "suricata_corelight"
| LIMIT 10000
| STATS  COUNT(), COUNT_DISTINCT(rule.signature_id) by source.ip
| RENAME `COUNT_DISTINCT(rule.signature_id)` as `Number of Rules`, `COUNT()` as `Number of Hits`, source.ip as `Source IP`
| SORT `Number of Rules` DESC, `Number of Hits` ASC
| KEEP `Source IP`, `Number of Rules`,`Number of Hits`

FROM logs-corelight.suricata*
| WHERE event.dataset == "suricata_corelight"
| LIMIT 10000
| STATS  COUNT(), COUNT_DISTINCT(rule.signature_id) by source.ip
| RENAME `COUNT_DISTINCT(rule.signature_id)` as `Number of Rules`, `COUNT()` as `Number of Hits`, source.ip as `Source IP`
| SORT `Number of Rules` DESC, `Number of Hits` ASC
| KEEP `Source IP`, `Number of Rules`,`Number of Hits`

attributes.title: Number of Rules & Number of Hits of Source IP

query.esql:
FROM logs-corelight.suricata*
| WHERE event.dataset == "suricata_corelight"
| LIMIT 10000
| STATS  COUNT(), COUNT_DISTINCT(source.ip) by event.severity, rule.signature_id, rule.name
| RENAME event.severity as Severity, rule.name as Signature, rule.signature_id as SID, `COUNT_DISTINCT(source.ip)` as `Number of Sources`, `COUNT()` as Count
| SORT `Number of Sources` DESC, Count DESC
| KEEP Severity, Signature, SID, `Number of Sources`, Count

FROM logs-corelight.suricata*
| WHERE event.dataset == "suricata_corelight"
| LIMIT 10000
| STATS  COUNT(), COUNT_DISTINCT(source.ip) by event.severity, rule.signature_id, rule.name
| RENAME event.severity as Severity, rule.name as Signature, rule.signature_id as SID, `COUNT_DISTINCT(source.ip)` as `Number of Sources`, `COUNT()` as Count
| SORT `Number of Sources` DESC, Count DESC
| KEEP Severity, Signature, SID, `Number of Sources`, Count

attributes.title: Severity & Number of Sources & Count of SID
